attributes.action: Disallow petitions that call for repeat referendums. The result is the result.
attributes.additional_details: There is a currently open petition calling for a second referendum that has attracted over 1m signatures. This is a democratic society where every persons vote counted. There is a great deal of animosity from the remain camp towards people that voted leave and they seem unable to accept the majority point of view
attributes.background: The recent result of the referendum has given rise to a petition calling for a 2nd vote. Some of the supposedly intellectual part of society doesn't seem to recognise democracy and is calling for a second vote on the basis that leave voters were too stupid to know what they were voting for.
